name: Block N Load 2
storyline: It’s time to get block to business! The sequel to the acclaimed Block N Load brings even more chaos, creativity, destruction, and mayhem. Our heroes, some old and some new, find themselves transported forward 1000 years in time to exciting new worlds with new weapons, blocks, abilities, and designs. Join their ongoing battle as you collect resources, build up your defenses, and destroy your opponent's base with dozens of unique blocks. Choose the right hero to tip balance in your favor as you ASSEMBLE, SMASH, AND DOMINATE.
summary: Get ready to assemble, smash and dominate! Face off in epic 5v5 matches where you can build up and destroy every block on any level while playing as the 22nd century’s greatest heroes. Work together and utilize insane abilities to claim victory!
